channel.title: How do i make NPCs hit higher/more often?
channel.description: The npc i want to hit higher and faster is ID: 50 and it's KBD. It currently hits like a 40 every 6 or so hits, the rest are just 0's... How can i make him hit more often and maybe higher each time?
